title: COVID-19 information for health professionals
author: Last reviewed
cleaned_text: COVID-19 is a notifiable disease under Part 9 of the Public Health Act 2016. For more information, see Human coronavirus of pandemic potential (including novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV). View the previous clinician alerts. A GP/doctor's referral is now required for COVID-19 PCR testing throughout WA. The following recommendations and/or position statements have been endorsed by the WA Department of Health Latest advice and updates on the COVID-19 immunisation including: Information about COVID-19 vaccines targeted at the community is available at HealthyWA website (external site).
